<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step"> <x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <applicaiton>SMART</applicaiton> <assignment_group/> <detailed_description/> <expected_result>VERIFY: The HAR no longer appears on the workbench in SMART.</expected_result> <number>TS0002386</number> <order>212</order> <prep_step>false</prep_step> <state>draft</state> <sys_created_by>SHILL</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-07-19 21:02:59</sys_created_on> <sys_id>33ae5593dbdf5b0040f8fcfa0c9619b3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>SHILL</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-07-19 21:02:59</sys_updated_on> <test>Click the Submit button to send the account back to Epic.
Similar to the extract, the import from SMART happens every day, from 4:30am to 10:30pm on the half hour. It is not real-time. You may need to wait for the next import batch to run before the account is updated and removed from the WQ.</test> <test_script display_value="TES0001006">e59c1d5fdb9f5b0040f8fcfa0c96199a</test_script> <testing_user/> </x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step> </record_update>
